actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to extend the veterans' educational assistance delimiting period from 8 years to 9 years in order to insure that no veteran loses his educational assistance entitlement while Congress considers legislative proposals extending such delimiting period to more than 9 years.

summary.text: Extends the veterans' educational assistance delimiting period from eight years to nine years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to extend the veterans' educational assistance delimiting period from 8 years to 9 years in order to insure that no veteran loses his educational assistance entitlement while Congress considers legislative proposals extending such delimiting period to more than 9 years.
